title: (x) Looking for LCD type - LCD {Marc O}
content:
Hey,  
I need to know of this font (Display-Font) please:

[http://img415.imageshack.us/img415/3764/lcd6jb.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20051231034550/http:/img415.imageshack.us/img415/3764/lcd6jb.jpg)

Can anyone help me?

Thank you very much  
and greetings from Germany  
Gigi :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [lcd.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=lcd.jpg) | 1.73 KB |
author: Gigis

comments.content:
A couple of options:

LCD  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/lcd/lcd/](http://web.archive.org/web/20051231034550/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/lcd/lcd/)

DS-Digital  
 [http://www.dafont.com/font.php?file=ds\_digital](http://web.archive.org/web/20051231034550/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=ds_digital)

LCD is the closest. Also: [Quartz](http://web.archive.org/web/20051231034550/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&startrow=1&records=20&currpage=1&totalrecords=4&searchby=&searchID=&searchletter=&searchstr=quartz&font_categories_checkbox=font_name_search&fontRendererText=250+5.6) and [FF Readout](http://web.archive.org/web/20051231034550/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=8&displayfontid=FF.11101.0.0&fontRendererText=250+5.6).

Thank you very much!!!  
This was a very big help!

Yours  
Gigi :)
